Package org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockCipherPRG
    An implementation of the PRG from a block cipher
    ElGamal
    An implementation of the ElGamal cryptosystem over a generic group (in which discrete log is hard).
    ElGamal.PK<G>
    Represents the public key in the ElGamal cryptosystem.
    ElGamal.SK<G>
    Represents the secret key in the ElGamal cryptosystem.
    MerkleTree<C>
    Implmentation of a binary Merkle tree commitment using a generic collision-resistant hash.
    PedersenCommitment<G>
    An implementation of Pedersen Commitment over a generic group.
    RandomOracleCollisionResistantHash<C,P>
    A collision-resistant hash based on a Random Oracle.
    RandomOracleCommitment<E>
    Commitment using random oracle.
    RandomOracleMerkleTree
    An implmentation of a Merkle tree using RandomOracleCollisionResistantHash as the collision-resistant hash function.
    TrapdoorPedersenCommitment<G>
    An implementation of PedersenCommitment over a generic group with the addition of a trapdoor for equivocation.
